title: 7 comet proc Annie (ARURF)
body:
So I was playing some ARURF just now, and while I know Annie is OP in this mode I didn't realize she was a rule bender too.

I somehow managed to proc 7 arcane comets in succession, as seen below in the recording (with play back slow-mo).
Is this a thing that can be done by certain items/abilities, or did I break it somehow face rolling the keyboard to unload spells?

Bug or just neat feature??

Sloth

[https://youtu.be/XqOVREMWpfg]

replies.body: I had a few more games with Annie and wasn't able to replicate it sadly :(
Probably bug, given that it's URF.
